name: Path: Find your way
description:
Challenge yourself in this new super addictive and creative game! Entirely free, try to find the right path to complete a level!

The rules are simple:
• Go from the green dot to the red dot
• Continue while the path is blue
• Try again otherwise!
• Get until 3 stars if you're fast enough

Get Path now, and find out your limits in the most downloaded game of the month!
